title: All 32 - Miami Dolphins: Tua's chances of seeing the field in 2020 and a newfound secondary strength with Adam Beasley (Football 6/2)
description:
Throughout June, the Pick Six podcast will be featuring conversations with guests who cover all 32 teams (in 20 minutes or fewer!). Our 2nd version of 'All 32' focuses on the Miami Dolphins with Miami Herald reporter Adam Beasley. Beasley and host Will Brinson discuss the plan at quarterback (1:30), with a QB room that now includes Ryan Fitzpatrick, Josh Rosen and Tua Tagovailoa. The guys also discuss possible position battles (11:30) and what a successful 2020 season for the Dolphins would entail (18:00). Keep it locked to the feed for conversations about your favorite team coming soon!
Check out Adam on the Miami Herald's 'Dolphins in Depth' podcast. 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @AdamHBeasley
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: All 32 - Miami Dolphins: Tua's chances of seeing the field in 2020 and a newfound secondary strength with Adam Beasley (Football 6/2)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Will the Dolphins finally play competitive December football? Will those games include Tua Tagovailoa? The Miami Herald's Adam Beasley joins us to break down the Dolphins in 2020.
